subject: Order no. 205-8346337-2842728. Simsonn ProX Ultra pedal set
description_text:
Hello

I have recently purchased your Simsonn Pro X Ultra pedal set via Amazon and
a part is missing from the main pedal set and part of my order haptic
motors) has not been delivered at all?

Missing Part

Having built the pedals I believe their is a part missing, I have the
carbon part of the  ‘heightening plate’ but this appears to be very weak
and bending with my heels in place which makes me believe that this should
be supported by a metal heightening plate part to reinforce the ‘carbon
heightening plate’ which is missing in the packaging. I have checked very
carefully and it is not in the box.

I understand the carbon part is an add on which should sit on top of a
metal heightening plate underneath it to provide strength. This metal plate
is missing completely. Without this the carbon plate is likely to break so
is currently unusable so I need this resolving quickly please.


Not delivered at all

I have also ordered the
SIMSONN Pro X Ultra Racing Simulator Hydraulic Pedals Sim Racing Pedals -
with Haptic Reactor (Optional) (VAM PRO 2)
Which has not been delivered at all so would like an update on when if and
when this will arrive?

I would appreciate your quick response please

Thanks

Ian Matthews
